replies.body: thank you! ^^

y not scuba taliyah
bc there arent sharks at pool parties
reksai

> [{quoted}](name=FloRaider42,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=csJYPiAw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-15T20:17:29.235+0000)
>
> Amazing
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
> Personally I would prefer her ! throwing shells and starfish and her E creating multiple types of shells, but otherwise very well made.

Why was this disliked.
More of a beach skin than a pool one haha
Isn't the ocean just a big pool?
a natural pool
Isn't pool party Leona sitting on the beach?
uh sir where is the suggestive swimwear this is a pool party skin for a female champ.
sir, this is a T-rated game, not pornhub.
A man (or pubescent teenager, rather) can  dream can't he?
taliyah has nothing to show regardless this is fine
Meanwhile I'm still waiting for the teased pool party katarina after so many years...
They've "teased" alot of skins. Just because its in the background doens't mean anything.
It means a lot. Are you going to fight me about it now?

http://i.imgur.com/ubEux9x.jpg

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/September_2013/PPNA/gppspl.jpg

Well im still waiting for my PP Aatrox, Garen who has shown up thrice, Ahri, etc. Oh and PP Orianna. There are a shit ton of "teasers" for champions, Riot can't deliver on them all. 

Remember these?:

http://static3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130906013239/leagueoflegends/images/b/b1/Viktor_Recall.png

http://static2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120802032044/leagueoflegends/images/8/8a/Battlecast_Cho%27Gath_Specs.jpg

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m83kuqiHv41rxv753o1_400.jpg

Oh and Battle Cast Anivia WAS IN AN ACTUAL TEASER. But she wasn't released and you don't see Anivia players complaining.

Yeah, but anivia players got a good skin recently while Katarina got a different char which is just using her kit for 1350 RP... I wanted a Kata skin! Not a different champion... and her PP was teased first... End of story.

New chapter!

If your using teasers as evidence for a champion deserving a skin, well Anivia deserves it more.

I'm sorry if you don't like Project Katarina, but it is a high quality skin. Maybe its too different. But Riot can't cater to every player's likes and dislikes. 

Project Katarina still is Katarina. Her body shape is the same, her abilities travel and effect the same way, her VO is the same, and her daggers are still daggers. 

Plus, imo you should just be grateful that you are getting quality skins, and have many  skins overall. Cass, Yorick, etfc. all haven't got skins forever yet aren't in line for reworks nor in need of ones.

The body shape/hair/voice it's all different, so dont blablabla bs... That robot is fatter and uglier... Stupid robotic anime skin. That's all. Aint Katarina, but a casual new champion they didnt have a kit for. 

"You should be grateful for getting skins that arent your champion anymore"... I prefer 0 skins than this. 
Yet again. We're not talking about cassio and yorick, there's 100 threads I said I would love to see new skins for them and get downvoted, from the ahri fanboys... And yeah. New chapter! Released it last night! Ty for noticing.

I said new chapter because you said end of story, as if the discussion were over.

How is Project Katarina anime? I see no connection to anime. 

And Project Katarina is ridiculously far from a new champion with Kat's kit. New champions have complete lore that takes place in the main universe, have new VO, have new models, new non-spell animations such as walking and emotes, etc.

Son. Quit it. Project shit has it's own lore, Riot confirmed it. The voice is hardly Katarina's even after a processing and stuff... Visually it has 0% Katarina. It's a new char, which is using katarina's kit. End of story. 

P.S the model/spells are all different. The animations are just a cheap copy as they didnt have new ideas.

P.S2 At least give my fiction a chance before you go bash me around. Bye. Dont reply. I dont like you anymore. Adios. Chao! Go away! ta taaa! ^^

Your absolutely right, Project does have its own lore. Thats why I specified **complete lore**. Because Project has excessively lacking lore. 

Its still Katarina's VO. Visually, its Katarina with actually armor and no boobs showing. She walks the same, and hops the same, and still spins. Its clearly recognizable as Katarina. 

She has the same VO, with a filter, she is wearing armor, has the same colors, same abilities, still spins, still uses daggers, very similar model, same animations on most things, a fitting splsahart, etc.

**I'm sorry you don't like AU skins, but a lot of people love those**. And were tf dd I bash you? I never even mentioned your fiction till you did, because you just misunderstood me. Which makes sense as you live in a totally different country, according to your league account's region. I'm not trying to be mean, I was saying "New chapter!" as if the discussion would continue, despite you saying "end of story".  

I have no problem with your fiction, I think its cool your so inspired and have continued it this long when many people groan at the thought of writing. 

You still haven't proven how her skin has any connection to anime. And a shit ton of people like anime, so Riot wants to occasionally cater to them.
Don't bother, KK is just a whiny Kat player that can't see how good PROJECT: Katarina is.

"Good" doesnt exist in the combination with that name.

Go shame the only person who actually cares for Katarina .i.

>Go shame the only person who actually cares for Katarina .i.

HAHA. Funny joke.
So funny kid.

> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=csJYPiAw,comment-id=000200000000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-04-16T18:22:34.930+0000)
>

I cry in my sleep when I think about Katarina rework. You aren't the only Kata worshipper!

SAME KIT THAT"S WHY IT"S THES AME SPELL U APE. THE COLOUR IS DIFFERNET> THE WALK IS DEFFIRENT AND THAT"S NOT A FILTER BUT A NEW VOICE WHICH WAS FILTERED.

I AM DONT ARGUIN WITH YOU. GET OFF MY LIFE

P.S I Dont watch anime, but when my anime fan friends say it's like an anime they watched I know it's ANime based.

Dont speak about my fiction. Nobody cares to read it or like, but im just dumb enough to keep writitng it for less than 10 people.

And yeah I am tired of talking you, making new BS 24/7, after I've been proven right.

>after I've been proven right.

LOLOL.

>AND THAT"S NOT A FILTER BUT A NEW VOICE WHICH WAS FILTERED.

LOLOLOL.


So wrong. oh so very wrong.
Beat it you troll.
Only troll here is you :)
As an Aniviia Main, I still haven't given up on Battlecast, but i'm willing to wait. That teaser was for Cho'Gath. We got Koggles the next year. Still hope! Not any time soon, but hope.

Battlecast Anivia does sound extremely cool. Although I feel like her wall would seem a little silly, to have some metal tech wall just magically pop up. Her E could be a fire bomb missle type of thing.
Unless they give it a redish-orange tint. To appear as if it was recently made. Like metal in heat. Yep, E has to be a missle. Ult a minefield/nuke strike.
Jinx's poolparty tease is older than Jinx herself for crying out loud...
Katarina's tease is since 2013... I dont think Jinx existed back then. Not sure so I cant claim.
Jinx was released 10/2013, but she was teased on the very first poolparty login screen (before she was even announced).
im still waiting for pool party everyone!!!!!!!!!

this is beautifully done 

but i think riot might stay away from water skins considering her release skin was a snow skin
I mean graves has both, why can't taliyah?

im an idiot you're completly right 

sorry had a brain fart LOL
Also, they were released the same year if i remember right...

nah they weren't 

pool party graves- 2013

snowday graves- 2016

I absolutely love it, my only problem is her outfit, what is up with the all covering swimsuit? she looks like shes from a conservative family.
I mean i know she inst supposed to be the sexy type, but she can wear a proper swim suite.
I believe it's a wet suit for diving, hence the snorkel mask.
